errors.error_description: Version compatibility error - specifies Django 2.0+ but changelog shows only Django 1.10 support
correction_candidates: Change Django requirement to Django 1.8+ to match the changelog
Update requirement to Django 1.10+ based on the latest changelog entry
Specify Django 1.6-1.10 to show the supported version range
Remove specific Django version and just say Django (compatible versions listed in setup.py)
errors.golden_answer: Update requirement to Django 1.10+ based on the latest changelog entry
